name: 60 Days till the World Ends
description:
Buenos Aires, Argentina, 2027 Malva is a typical teenager struggling with typical teenage problems: a black hole is approaching Earth and the world will end in 60 days , her father doesn't allow anyone to leave the apartment, there's a giant frog in the bathroom singing by the toilet, her brother is obssesed with dating apps, her sister is going through a metamorphosis, her mother watches television 24/7 without saying a single word and the apartment's paintings seem to be alive. To make matters worse, Malva's friend Erika has been acting weird and ignoring her. Nothing makes sense and nobody questions it. But are things really as they seem?

"60 Days till the World Ends" is a very strange game made by Axel Vejar Dossow for the Narrative Driven Jam #6 following the theme "Magical realism".  I don't even know if this game fits any known genre!

CREATED WITH RPG MAKER MV
Rpg Maker MV belongs to Kadokawa

Features

2 endings (and you'll love both of them!) VERY bizzarre characters, scenarios and events 20 unlockable achievements perfect for wasting time Unique original soundtrack Original pixel-art graphics You can use a cellphone with many apps!!!!!!!1111
